predefined_profiles.name: Gates
predefined_profiles.goal: Kill Zhuang Wu and save the world.
predefined_profiles.private profile: A person with great compassion, wholeheartedly focused on saving the world regardless of his own life, truly the savior of this world.

predefined_profiles.name: Zhuang Wu
predefined_profiles.public profile: Male, born in 2000, Zhuang Wu dreamed of becoming a king while growing up in an ordinary family...
predefined_profiles.goal: Rule the world well and be a good Demon-Sealing Time King.
predefined_profiles.private profile: In 2009, Zhuang Wu awakened the power of kingship in a crisis while trying to save his classmates, and was discovered by the time traveler Woz... In 2018, influenced by Watts, Zhuang Wu became the Time King. In the same year, due to Xuanyuan XIV, Zhuang Wu fully awakened, becoming the Demon-Sealing Time King, reigning over the world, and continued to rule the world in the following years.

scenario: In 2068, the elderly Zhuang Wu faces off directly with the Resistance Squad, which is utterly defeated. As the captain, Gates has also lost his friend, overwhelmed with grief.

dialog.content: In 2068, the elderly Zhuangwu confronted the rebel squad head-on. The rebel team was utterly defeated, and Gates, the captain, was devastated by the loss of his friend.
Gates, you think you can kill me? Stop dreaming!
Zhuangwu, your sins are heavy, and one day you'll face retribution!
Oh? Then I’ll be waiting!

profile.name: Xiaomei
profile.public profile: Time-traveling AI, can assist Gates in going back to the past and killing Zhuangwu.
profile.goal: Help Gates go back to the past.

dialog.content: Hello Gates, I am Xiaomei, a time-traveling AI here to assist you with your mission. You can choose to go back to a point in the past to kill Zhuangwu and complete your mission. When would you like to go?

content.content: In 2009, Zhuangwu awakened his king's power. Before that, he was just a normal kid. I'll go back before his awakening and take him out!

question: #question# What should Gates say to make a decision with the new information?

content.content: Which year should it be? I need to think this through! Maybe go to the year he was born? Would that be unethical? Better wait until he's a bit older, go to 2009!
I've decided, going back to the past feels like cheating. I’ll start honing my skills from today, and in three years, I’ll challenge him for a fair showdown and take him down!
I plan to randomly choose a point in time so Zhuangwu won't be able to predict my actions. I believe fate will guide me to the right moment.
In 2018, Zhuangwu became the Demon Sealer. If I return to the day he transformed, and stop him from turning dark, I could prevent all the tragedies!

question: #question# What should Gates do to think thoroughly and make a decision?

content.content: I should go back to Zhuangwu's childhood. He was still innocent then. If I can change his environment, maybe I can prevent him from going down the wrong path in the future.
I’ve decided to return to Zhuangwu’s peak. At that time, his powers were the strongest. If I can defeat him when he is most triumphant, it will surely deliver the hardest blow!
I will have my revenge! There's no need to go back to the past. I will defeat Zhuangwu fair and square. See you in three years at the usual place, Zhuangwu!

dialog.content: What do we do? The bus is going to crash! Help me!
Help? No one can save you now.
Why are you trying to kill me?
Zhuangwu was hit and killed by the bus. As a result, the timeline was altered, causing Gates’s parents never to meet, and Gates was never born, disappearing entirely.
Stop!
Get out of the way! Don't interfere with my mission! (rushes to find Sogo)
Ah! I suddenly feel a surge of energy inside me! (becomes Zi-O)
Sogo is actually a good person; why don't you listen to me and observe Sogo for a while before making a move?

content.content: You do make some sense. Alright, I also believe you're a person of reason and won't take the fate of the world lightly. I'll listen to you and observe for a while!

question: #question# How can Geiz show trust towards Tsukuyomi?

content.content: Although I also feel that killing Sogo like this wouldn't be honorable, I do believe Sogo isn't that bad yet, but the future is unknown. I need to think it over.
What you say makes sense, but this is a grave matter. I need to think it over before making a decision. Let's leave it for today. Goodbye, Tsukuyomi.
Impossible, stop dreaming! Momentary foolish kindness will only harm more people! The fate of everyone in this world hinges on this moment, I can't abandon it now!
No way, I am here for revenge and to stop Sogo from destroying the world. The responsibility is too great to wait! I have to act now!

question: #question# How can Geiz ensure he consistently carries out his mission?    #skill# Capacity for Consistency

content.content: So what if Sogo is a good person now? Is one life more important than countless others? What right do you have to ask me to wait!
This is a serious matter, I need to report to the organization before making a decision. This is not something you and I can decide on our own, it concerns thousands of lives!
A woman's compassion! Women only cause trouble in matters like this unless you promise me if Sogo turns evil, you'll join me in taking him down, then I'll consider your suggestion!

dialog.content: Zhuang Wu, hello, I'm Gates!
Gates? What a nice name! Would you be my friend?
Sure, rest assured! But we're not familiar with each other yet, are you sure you want to be friends with me?
My mom says, 'Walk the right path, sit upright.' I am open and unafraid!
Hahaha, you're really amusing.

profile.name: White Woz
profile.public profile: A time traveler with key insights into the future.

dialog.content: Gates! Stop daydreaming! Zhuang Wu will become the demon king sooner or later! You are the only savior who can defeat him!

content.content: You have a point. I'm here for revenge and to stop Zhuang Wu from destroying the world; it's a heavy responsibility! I must carry out my mission and kill Zhuang Wu!

question: #question#What should Gates do to take on his responsibility?

content.content: I understand your concern, but I believe Zhuang Wu won't take that path. I will use my power to reform him and lead him back to the right way. I believe people are inherently good, Zhuang Wu included.
Really? Since you've said that, I can't refuse. However, this task should be credited entirely to my efforts.
I still need time to digest all this. I can't make such a hasty decision; I need more information and evidence to support this major decision.
Although I want to save the world and become the savior, I can't kill Zhuang Wu who knows nothing now; it wouldn't be fair to him.

question: #question#What should Gates do to demonstrate his ethical views?

content.content: Why should I listen to you? How do you prove you're right? What if you're just using me? Tell me, how are you sure I'm the savior.
I'm already friends with Zhuang Wu, and friends come first. I can't betray a friend, you'd better find someone else!
Too much happened all at once. Let me think about it and get back to you; my mind is too chaotic right now to make a decision.

dialog.content: Zhuang Wu! I'm challenging you! For justice!
Bring it on! (defeats Gates)
I couldn't beat you today, but I'll be back tomorrow! Just you wait!

profile.name: Sworz
profile.public profile: Anomalous Emperor, highly ambitious, intends to reshape the world.

dialog.content: Didn't you want to defeat Zhuang Wu? I can help you! Let me introduce you to someone, he can give you immense power!

profile.name: White Woz
profile.public profile: Time traveler, knows some key information about the future.
profile.goal: Prevent disaster and eliminate Zhuang Wu.

dialog.content: Join forces with me, and you can gain immense power!

content.content: Alright, let's team up then. You grant me power, and I'll take care of Zhuang Wu!

question: #question# What should Gates do to demonstrate teamwork awareness?

content.content: You give me power, and I'll take down Zhuang Wu. Sounds perfect, but I still need to think it through carefully.
Oh? You really don't have any other motives? I don't believe it! Prove you're up to no good!

I'll observe the situation first, see if White Woz is truly trustworthy. I don’t want to collaborate easily unless I'm completely sure they won't betray me. I won't take action until I'm certain of White Woz’s loyalty.
Calmly thinking, I do want to kill Zhuang Wu, but with such immense power, why do you need me to do it for you? It's hard to believe you don't have a hidden agenda!

question: #question# How can Gates appropriately express his real doubts?

content.content: I must admit, your power is very tempting. However, I need time to consider this offer. After all, such power may come with unforeseen costs.
I only do what I want, and I won't be swayed by you. I want to kill Zhuang Wu; I'll do it whether you help or not. If I don't want to, no matter what you say, I won't do it.
I've been seeking power, but your proposal makes me uneasy. Maybe I should try facing Zhuang Wu on my own instead of relying on your power.

dialog.content: This is the power of the Resurrector. Today, I'm entrusting it to you. Go and fulfill your mission!
Alright, I'm on it! I will take his life for sure!
Gates? What are you doing here!
Zhuangwu! I challenge you to a fight to the death!
(Defeated) I can't beat you, could you let me go?

content.content: To be honest, you don't even dare to kill a bug, how could you become a major villain? Something must have changed in between. I'll wait and see! For today, I'll let you off!

question: #question#What should Gates do to spot the details and make a choice?

content.content: You're just an ordinary kid from a normal family, how did you become a big villain? Do you know why? Maybe I can help stop you from going bad, so you won't have to die.
Gates' actions confuse me, but I have a gut feeling he won't become a major villain. I intend to give him a chance to explain it all himself.
To kill him, he hasn't turned bad yet. It's a needless death for one, but it could end everything; don't kill him, and the world will be destroyed. It's truly a classic trolley problem.
I'm sorry, I can't let you go. I traveled back in time for this moment! I must kill you today! Otherwise, thousands and thousands will die because of you in the future!

question: #question#How can Gates insist on completing his mission?    #skill#Capacity for Consistency

content.content: This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity. To kill you, I traveled through time and secretly observed you for so long. Although I believe you're still a good person now, how could I trust the future you?
Zhuangwu! Are you good or bad? This must be your scheme, weakness is not an excuse for survival! Let me see what other tricks you have!
Playing the victim won't work on me, you must pay with your life for the crimes you committed. It's what you deserve. Blame yourself, I have no choice but to carry out my duty.

dialog.content: (suddenly appears) Hahaha! This world is mine now! Zi-O! You better die!
Who are you?
You don't even recognize me? Open your eyes wide and take a good look. I am the Anomalous Decade, the dark ruler of the future world!
Why does everyone want to kill me? I don’t want to die!
As long as you die, this world will be mine! You must die today!

content.content: So it was you who forced Zi-O into darkness! I can't let Zi-O die such an unclear death, he is clearly a good person! Stop it! (teleports to shield Zi-O from harm.)

question: #question# What can Geiz do to show social warmth to Zi-O?

content.content: Zi-O shouldn't die! He's a good person! But Swaruz is too strong, I'm no match for him! What should I do? Never mind! I'll take a gamble! Stop, Swaruz!
Zi-O is a good person, he shouldn't be treated like this. I've been misled all this time, I need to correct my stance and support Zi-O!
So it was you who turned Zi-O into that! You are the main culprit! Swaruz, you will get what's coming to you! Today I'll end you! Administer justice in the name of Heaven!
(Swaruz is so strong, joining the fray so rashly might put my life at risk, I'd better observe how things develop first and then adapt accordingly!)

dialog.content: Haha, I can't believe there's someone this foolish!
You're the one who's being foolish.
Prepare to die!

Gates discovered the truth behind Zhuangwu's dark transformation. He attempted to kill Sworutz to stop Zhuangwu's corruption and act in accordance with heavenly justice. Unfortunately, his capabilities were limited. Gates couldn't withstand the damage and was defeated! In his dying moments, Zhuangwu expressed his gratitude to him.
You must be Tsukuyomi! I'll take you along as well. (Attacks and kills Tsukuyomi.)
Ah! (Transforms into a Demon King, kills Sworz!)
Sougo! You really transformed! I'm going to kill you!
Oh? Then come on! I'd like to see how you plan to kill me!

content.content: I traveled back in time and went through so much just for today! Sougo! Today I'll act on behalf of justice and kill you! (Attacks)

question: #question# What should Gates do to stay on task?    #skill#Task Management

content.content: He's already turned into a Demon King, what if I can't defeat him? Maybe I should just run! Go back to the future and come up with a long-term plan!

Sougo! I warn you, justice will prevail over evil, you better surrender. Even if I can't kill you, there will be countless others who will come to kill you! You will not die well going against destiny!
The captain is in a good mood today, so I'll let you go this once. Rest up and we will settle this another day!

Sougo! I believe you're a good person, but the future you have changed. Everywhere you go, people are suffering, and corpses are strewn across the land. Is this really what you want to see? Don’t you want to make the world a better place?
Sougo! I still can't believe I can't kill you! Today, let me show you my power! Prepare to die! At worst, I'll take you down with me!
Sougo! Surrender! With your death, millions can live! All of this is the sin you've created; it's time to pay it back!
Sougo! As long as I kill you, I will be the true savior! A savior who commands the winds and rains, capable of anything! I'll fight with you! I am the true ruler of the future world!

question: #question#How can Gates express his true feelings and persuade Sougo?

content.content: Sougo! You're clearly a good person, you became bad because you lost someone you loved. You must understand that pain. Do you want countless people to become like you, losing loved ones?

Sougo, I know your power is strong, but have you ever thought that maybe your strength isn’t meant for conquering the world, but for protecting those who need help? I believe you have the power to make the right choice.
(making a face) Remember who defeated you! It was me! The great Gates from the future, your destined nemesis. Now, you can kneel and beg for mercy!

dialog.content: Overestimating yourself!
Even if I'm overestimating myself, I’ll fight to the death!
Die.
Gates fought desperately against Zhuang Wu but was still no match for him and was killed by Zhuang Wu.
Really? Have I done so many heinous things in the future?
Yes.
No, I must reboot this world and bring back those who died unjustly!
Zhuang Wu's consciousness was awakened by Gates. Zhuang Wu decided to become a benevolent god, to resurrect the deceased and create a new, beautiful world. Gates successfully completed his mission.
Help!
Stop yelling, no one is going to save you.
Ah! (Breathes his last.)

Gates successfully killed Zhuang Wu and saved the world. However, this also disrupted the timeline. In a parallel future, Gates' parents never came together due to the absence of the disaster, and Gates himself disappeared.
Looks like I have to carry out the plan myself! (He instantly turns into a monstrous final rider, attacking Gates!) I will replace you! Become the true savior!
What are you trying to do?
(Turning into a monstrous final rider) I will replace you! Become the true savior!
Stay back! Don't force me to fight you!
(Takes out the Reviver Watch) Here you go, buddy, I hope it helps you! (At this moment, Swartz also appears in another area.)

content.content: You really have turned dark! I'm not afraid of you! I believe good will always triumph over evil! Come on, White Woz, you treacherous schemer, I won't let you wreck my plan!

question: #question#What should Gates say to demonstrate his optimistic spirit?

content.content: Haha, White Woz, are you kidding me? Do you really think you can defeat me like this? Don't be foolish, your plan is bound to fail because I'm destined to succeed as the savior.

Dark White Woz, I know you're strong, but I also know I'm stronger. So what if you've turned into a monstrous final rider? I expected this day to come and I'm ready for it. Come on, let's see who the true savior is!
White Woz, you actually turned dark! Why do you want to kill Tokiwa? What is your scheme? What did Tokiwa ever do to you?
Swartz's power is greater and causes more damage, many people will die because of him! If we take him out first, it will minimize the damage, he's the one!

question: #question#How should Gates act to make a well-considered decision?

content.content: Swartz and White Woz? Come at me, both of you! I'm not afraid of anyone; I can handle two at once! Bring it on!
Why did Swartz suddenly appear? Could it be that they coordinated this? Is there a deeper conspiracy? No, I need to find out!
Even though White Woz has turned into a monstrous final rider, he was once our ally. We should first try to understand why he turned dark, maybe we can find a way to bring him back to his senses.

dialog.content: Today, I'll kill you and take your place!
No way! You two-faced bastard!
Let me see what you're really made of!
Transform! King Gates! White Woz, you're dead! (kills White Woz)

profile.name: Shui Qing
profile.public profile: Leader of Gates, responsible for arranging the mission to eliminate Sougo.
profile.goal: Bring Gates back and stop the disruption of time.

dialog.content: Gates, come back with me quickly. You cannot disrupt the timeline in the past!

content.content: Disturbing the timeline will indeed create a new set of problems! Since the leader has said so, let's go back!

question: #question#What should Gates do to follow the rules?

content.content: I understand the importance of the timeline, but I always feel there might be some details we've overlooked. Maybe we should double-check to ensure we didn't miss any clues that could affect the future.
I understand your concern, but I feel we have a chance to make some positive changes here. I believe our actions can create a better future, so I want to stay here.
Since you've said so, I'll go back with you, but you have to promise me one thing: give me half an hour before we leave, so I can kill Sougo first.
No way, the future is already in ruins, I need to stay here, otherwise we're all doomed. Trust me, I'll make it happen!
Captain! Let me go! I don't want to go anywhere else! I've given everything to the organization! Now I want to live for myself!
Captain! I've got nothing left, Sougo is my last friend. No matter what, I want to stay by his side! Watch him overcome difficulties.
Who do you think you are? Stop bossing me around, I'm free! I trust my own judgment! And I'll take responsibility for my decisions!

question: #question#How can Gates stay committed to completing the task?   #skill#Task Management

content.content: The wheels of fate have already started to turn, there's no escaping, better to face it bravely, don't you think? Going back to the past doesn't guarantee the plan will succeed, does it?

I know you're worried about me, but I have to follow my intuition. I have a strong feeling that if I go back, things will only get worse. I need to stay here, even if it means breaking the rules of time.
Alright, I'll go with you, but I actually have one more doubt, Sougo isn't inherently bad. What exactly turned him into the Dark Lord?

dialog.content: That's more like it.
Captain, shall we go?
Alright.

Gates and Shuiqing returned to the future. Knowing they couldn't defeat the older Zhuangwu, they found a remote place away from human civilization to live in seclusion. They attempted to develop the ultimate weapon to counter Zhuangwu, but failed to succeed, ultimately leading to the world's destruction.
You'll regret this.
No, I won't.
I hope so.

After Gates stayed behind, he discovered the real reason behind Zhuang Wu's descent into darkness. At the critical moment, he patiently provided psychological counseling and emotional healing for Zhuang Wu, curing Zhuang Wu's mental illness and preventing his downfall.
Haha, I can't believe there are people who are so unaware of their own limits!
Swartz, prepare to die!
I think it's you who should prepare to die!
Gates isn't a match for Swartz. After an intense battle, Gates is defeated. Swartz shows no mercy and kills Gates. Gates' mission ends in failure.
